title: Yemma Azhagamma Lyrics Vanamagan
stanzas:
<div>
Yemma Hey Azhagamma Song Lyrics From Vanamagan

yemmammaa azhagammaa
irudhayam irudhayam
mezhugammaa

yemmaa nee azhagamma
viral pada viral pada
ilagammaa

yemmammaa azhagammaa
vizhigalil naanangal
vilagammaa

yemmaa nee tamizhammaa
ivanadhu thaai mozhi
pazhagammaa
yemmamma maa...

yaaro nee
engirundhu vandhaai
en nenjil
siragu thanthaai.

yaaro nee
poondhuyiril vandhaai
ena kannil
kanavu thanthaai

oru sila nodi
kuzhanthaiyai pole
maru sila nodi
kadavulai pole
pala nodigalil
adhanilum melaai
neeyaanaai.

uyirinai tharum
udhiraththai pole
uyrarathai thodum
sigaraththai pole
anuthinam thinam
athaninum perithaai
neeyaanaai

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
irudhayam irudhayam
mezhugammaa

yemmaa nee azhagamma
viral pada viral pada
ilagammaa

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
vizhigalil naanangal
vilagammaa

yemmaa nee tamizhammaa
ivanadhu thaai mozhi
pazhagammaa

Vaeredho thuyi ulagam ondril
ivanaale pookkireney
oonellaa min unarvu ondru
ivanaale paaigirene

ivanidam panam
oru thuli illai
manitharin gunam
siruthuli illai.
ivanidam manam
muzhuvadhum muzhuvadhum
thanthaeney

thirai vilagiy medaiyai pole
pani vilagiya kodaiyai pole
mazhai nanaithidum
aadaiyai pole aaneney.

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
irudhayam irudhayam
mezhugammaa

yemmaa nee azhagamma
viral pada viral pada
ilagammaa

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
vizhigalil naanangal
vilagammaa

yemmaa nee tamizhammaa
ivanadhu thaai mozhi
...

maram chedi kodiglai
anaithaaye
malargalin idhazhgalai
thudaithaaye
un kaiyil naan sernthaal
en seivaai

vanangalin magan
ena piranthaaye.
thuligalin madiyinil
valarnthaaye.
maan en meen
naan thanthaal
en seivaai.

maaraathe unnai
un pole yaetreney
aanaalum unmai
enendru kaetteney
uraithidu yaaro nee.

yaaro nee
poondhuyiril vandhaai
ena kannil
kanavu thanthaai

oru sila nodi
kuzhanthaiyai pole
maru sila nodi
kadavulai pole
pala nodigalil
adhanilum melaai
neeyaanaai.

uyirinai tharum
udhiraththai pole
uyrarathai thodum
sigaraththai pole
anuthinam thinam
athaninum perithaai
neeyaanaai

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
irudhayam irudhayam
mezhugammaa

yemmaa nee azhagamma
viral pada viral pada
ilagammaa

yemmaa ye azhagammaa
vizhigalil naanangal
vilagammaa

yemmaa nee tamizhammaa
ivanadhu thaai mozhi
pazhagammaa
